name: Canadian Life Companies Split Corp. 2012 Preferred Shares
longDescription: Canadian Life Companies Split Corp is an investment management firm. The company invests primarily in an actively managed portfolio of common shares comprised primarily of four core large-capitalization Canadian life insurance companies. The firm's objective is to provide holders of Preferred shares with a cumulative preferential floating rate monthly dividend.
fulldescription: Canadian Life Companies Split Corp is an investment management firm. The firm's objective is to provide holders of Preferred shares with a cumulative preferential floating rate monthly dividend.
fullAddress: 200 Front Street West,Suite 2510, P.O. Box 51, Toronto, ON, CA
